titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: SUBSTANCE USE IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS INDICATOR (BENZODIAZEPINES NON PRESCRIBED) - Description

div.p: SUBSTANCE USE IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS INDICATOR (BENZODIAZEPINES NON PRESCRIBED) is the same as attribute SUBSTANCE USE IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS INDICATOR, to indicate whether the PERSON has used the SUBSTANCE Non-Prescribed Benzodiazepines in the last three months.
